displayProperties.name: Superintendent
displayProperties.description: Tom Chapman, creator and engineer of Braytech.

displayProperties.name: Subroutine
displayProperties.description: This Guardian is a beacon of light who, through their actions, have proven themselves to value bravery and service above all else.

displayProperties.name: Researcher
displayProperties.description: A technical fellow at Clovis Bray, this Guardian seeks to improve Braytech.

displayProperties.name: Commonality
displayProperties.description: Percentage of players who are indexed by VOLUSPA who've acquired or redeemed this entry.

displayProperties.name: Score value
displayProperties.description: This record's score value.

displayProperties.name: Score value
displayProperties.description: This record's remaining score value (sum of remaining intervals).

displayProperties.name: Record intervals
displayProperties.description: Some records have intervals. Different intervals have varied requirements and score values.

displayProperties.name: Character bound
displayProperties.description: These items are character-bound. This means that each character discovers them uniquely.

displayProperties.name: Coverage
displayProperties.description: This translation's coverage represented by percentage.

displayProperties.name: Total resets
displayProperties.description: All seasons' resets. Tracks from Season 4 onward.

displayProperties.name: Destiny Tracker Elo
displayProperties.description:
Player's current Elo rating.

Elo ratings from a third-party web site, _Destiny Tracker_. _Destiny Tracker_ provides Elo ratings for all Destiny players who participate in _Crucible_ and _Gambit_ activities.
A purple rune. Purple runes include; Rune of Joy, Rune of the Beast, and Rune of Jubilation.
displayProperties.name: Purple Rune

displayProperties.description: A red rune. Red runes include; Rune of Ambition, Rune of Gluttony, and Rune of Cunning.
displayProperties.name: Red Rune

displayProperties.description: A green rune. Green runes include; Rune of War, Rune of Pride, and Rune of Desire.
displayProperties.name: Green Rune

displayProperties.description: A blue rune. Blue runes include; Rune of Excess, Rune of Wealth, and Rune of Pleasure.

Latent Memories
displayProperties.description: Mysterious test nodes are scattered across Mars. What is their purpose?

displayProperties.name: Unknown Error
displayProperties.description:
An error occurred while rendering this tooltip.

This is probably a temporary error. Apologies.

displayProperties.name: Stale Profile
displayProperties.description: Profile data is stale. This means that background refresh is paused due to inactivity or the service failed to reach Bungie's servers for the moment.

displayProperties.name: Active Triumphs and Seals
displayProperties.description: View all active Triumphs and Seals.

displayProperties.name: Legacy Triumphs and Seals
displayProperties.description: View a collection of legacy Triumphs and Seals.

displayProperties.name: Seasonal Challenges
displayProperties.description: Complete limited-time challenges for Season rank, Bright Dust, and other rewards.

displayProperties.name: Medals
displayProperties.description: Medals are earned through feats of gameplay expertise. See the list of medals and how many of each you've earned.

displayProperties.name: Exotic Catalysts
displayProperties.description: Exotic catalysts expand the power of your Exotic weapons. Find them and finish their objectives to unlock your arsenal's full potential.

displayProperties.name: Lore
displayProperties.description: Lore tells broader stories from the Destiny universe. Unlock and read lore pages by completing Triumphs.

displayProperties.name: Stat Trackers
displayProperties.description: Stat trackers can be applied to your emblem from its inspect view. Applied trackers will appear on your nameplate whenever visible.

displayProperties.name: Clan
displayProperties.description: About your clan and what it stands for.

displayProperties.name: Roster
displayProperties.description: Find friends to play with.

displayProperties.name: Administration
displayProperties.description: Take action on clan matters and members.

displayProperties.name: Historical Stats
displayProperties.description: Compare _Historical Stats_ for several activity modes across all clan members.

displayProperties.name: Timetable
displayProperties.description: Put clan events down on paper and make it official.

displayProperties.name: Relationships
displayProperties.description: See which clan members you dedicate your time to most.

displayProperties.name: Equipment
displayProperties.description: Evaluate your Guardian's battle readiness.

displayProperties.name: Postmaster
displayProperties.description: Postmaster Frames dutifully oversee deliveries, messages, and lost items.

displayProperties.name: Consumables
displayProperties.description: Supplies and materials that can be used to enhance your Guardian and their gear.

displayProperties.name: Vault
displayProperties.description: Safe storage for general items. Accessible to all your characters.

displayProperties.name: Carnage
displayProperties.description: All of the selected Guardian's recent activities

displayProperties.name: Bookmarks
displayProperties.description: Activities you've bookmarked

displayProperties.name: Graphs
